An insider told The Daily Star: Robbie Williams is a huge name so would naturally be a massive ratings hit. Not only that, he is also straight-talking and comical. "We all understand that right now America is where Simon Cowell 's focus has to be. There aren't many people that can fill his shoes, but Robbie Williams just might be able to do it.
